title: Poc and Giro roll out new helmets to commemorate the 2023 Tour de France
content:
Limited-edition versions of the Poc Ventral Air helmet for Team EF and Giro Aries helmet for Team Canyon-SRAM commemorate July's big races.

Read the full article at Poc and Giro roll out new helmets to commemorate the 2023 Tour de France on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
